Package org.action.project

Class ProjectManager

java.lang.Object
org.action.project.ProjectManager
public class ProjectManager extends Object
This class provides functionality for managing HDB projects, including creating, editing, and deleting projects, searching and filtering projects based on various criteria, checking project eligibility for users, and storing/loading project data from persistent storage. It serves as the central management point for all project-related operations in the system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectManager()
    Constructs a new ProjectManager and loads existing projects from persistent storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectManager

      public ProjectManager()
      Constructs a new ProjectManager and loads existing projects from persistent storage. Projects are loaded from a CSV file and added to the project list. If a project entry is missing required parameters, it is skipped with a warning message.

  • Method Details

    • store

      public void store()
      Stores all project data to the CSV file. This method should be called when quitting the program to save all project changes.

    • createProject

      public void createProject(user usr, String projectName, String neighbourhood, String type1, int type1_count, int type1_price, String type2, int type2_count, int type2_price, String opening_date, String closing_date, int officer_slots)
      Creates a new project with the specified parameters. Only users with HDBManager role can create projects. Validates that no project with the same name exists and that the manager is not already managing a project with overlapping application period.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user attempting to create the project
      projectName - The unique name for the new project
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood where the project is located
      type1 - The first flat type offered in the project
      type1_count - The number of units available for the first flat type
      type1_price - The price of the first flat type
      type2 - The second flat type offered in the project
      type2_count - The number of units available for the second flat type
      type2_price - The price of the second flat type
      opening_date - The project's opening date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
      closing_date - The project's closing date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
      officer_slots - The number of officer slots available for this project

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(user usr, String projectName)
      Deletes a project from the system. Only users with HDBManager role who manage the project can delete it.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user attempting to delete the project
      projectName - The name of the project to delete

    • editProject

      public void editProject(user usr, String projectNameOld, String projectName, String neighbourhood, String flatType1, int flatCount1, int flatPrice1, String flatType2, int flatCount2, int flatPrice2, String openingDate, String closingDate, int officerSlots)
      Edits an existing project with updated parameters. Only users with HDBManager role who manage the project can edit it. Ensures flat counts don't decrease below current bookings.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user attempting to edit the project
      projectNameOld - The current name of the project
      projectName - The new name for the project
      neighbourhood - The updated neighbourhood
      flatType1 - The updated first flat type
      flatCount1 - The updated number of units for first flat type
      flatPrice1 - The updated price for first flat type
      flatType2 - The updated second flat type
      flatCount2 - The updated number of units for second flat type
      flatPrice2 - The updated price for second flat type
      openingDate - The updated opening date
      closingDate - The updated closing date
      officerSlots - The updated number of officer slots

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(user usr, String keyword)
      Toggles the visibility of a project. Only users with HDBManager role who manage the project can change its visibility.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user attempting to toggle project visibility
      keyword - The name of the project to toggle visibility for

    • projectsToString

      public List<String> projectsToString(user usr, List<Project> projects)
      Converts a list of projects to formatted strings.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the project information
      projects - The list of projects to convert
      Returns:
      List containing a formatted string representation of the projects

    • mergeProjects

      public List<Project> mergeProjects(List<Project> p1, List<Project> p2)
      Merges two lists of projects, removing duplicates.
      Parameters:
      p1 - First list of projects
      p2 - Second list of projects
      Returns:
      A merged list with no duplicate projects

    • filterRelated

      public List<Project> filterRelated(user usr)
      Filters projects related to the user (projects the user manages or is assigned to).
      Parameters:
      usr - The user to find related projects for
      Returns:
      List of projects related to the user

    • filterFlat

      public List<Project> filterFlat(user usr, String flatType)
      Filters projects by flat type.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the filtering
      flatType - The flat type to filter by
      Returns:
      List of projects matching the flat type filter

    • filterNeighbourhood

      public List<String> filterNeighbourhood(user usr, String neighbourhood)
      Filters projects by neighbourhood and returns formatted string representations.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the filtering
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood to filter by
      Returns:
      List containing a formatted string of projects in the specified neighbourhood

    • searchName

      public List<String> searchName(user usr, String name)
      Searches for projects by name and returns formatted string representations.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user performing the search
      name - The project name to search for
      Returns:
      List containing a formatted string of projects matching the name search

    • projectExists

      public int projectExists(user usr, String projectName, boolean visChk)
      Checks if a project with the specified name exists.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user performing the check
      projectName - The project name to check
      visChk - Whether to check project visibility
      Returns:
      Number of matching projects found (typically 0 or 1)

    • checkManagedOfficerOf

      public boolean checkManagedOfficerOf(user usr, String projectName, boolean visChk, boolean manager)
      Checks if the user is a manager or officer of the specified project.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user to check
      projectName - The project name to check
      visChk - Whether to check project visibility
      manager - True to check if user is a manager, false to check if user is an officer
      Returns:
      True if the user is a manager/officer of the project, false otherwise

    • getProjectObjByName

      public Project getProjectObjByName(user usr, String projectName, boolean visChk)
      Retrieves a project object by its name.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the project
      projectName - The name of the project to retrieve
      visChk - Whether to check project visibility
      Returns:
      The Project object if found, null otherwise

    • getProjectByName

      public List<String> getProjectByName(user usr, String projectName, EnquiriesManager enqMan, boolean visChk)
      Retrieves detailed information about a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the project details
      projectName - The name of the project to retrieve details for
      enqMan - The EnquiriesManager for handling project-related enquiries
      visChk - Whether to check project visibility
      Returns:
      List containing a formatted string with detailed project information

    • getValidFilters

      public List<String> getValidFilters(user usr)
      Gets the list of valid filter options available to a user based on their role.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user to get filter options for
      Returns:
      List of filter options available to the user

    • userFlatOptions

      public List<String> userFlatOptions(user usr, String projectName)
      Gets the flat options available to a user for a specific project or all projects.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user to get flat options for
      projectName - The project name to check options for, or empty string for all projects
      Returns:
      List of flat types available to the user

    • getProjectList

      public List<String> getProjectList(user usr)
      Gets a list of all projects the user can view based on their eligibility.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the project list
      Returns:
      List containing a formatted string of viewable projects
